doc:
Rae Berger https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rae_Berger 0 Rae Berger or Rhea Berger (March 26, 1877 – November 9, 1931) was an early silent film actor and director. He is erroneously listed in Duke University's "Women Film Pioneers"; he was in fact male. Rae_Berger or Rhea_Berger ( March_26_,_1877 – November_9_,_1931 ) was an_early_silent_film_actor_and_director . He is_erroneously_listed in Duke_University 's_"_Women_Film_Pioneers_" ; he was in fact_male .
